TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConnectionStringEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

summary.span: 为用户界面提供基类，以便在设计时选择和编辑连接字符串属性。

span.span: Provides a base class for a user interface to select and edit a connection string property at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的实例是一个对象, 该对象可在设计时用于选择和编辑连接字符串表达式, 并将表达式分配给控件属性。An instance of the class is a object that can be used at design time to select and edit a connection string expression and to assign the expression to a control property. 例如, 控件在设计时使用类来设置属性的值。For example, the control uses the class at design time to set the value of the property. 使用特性将与属性相关联。Use the attribute to associate the with a property. 在设计图面上编辑关联的属性时, 设计器宿主将调用方法。When the associated property is edited on the design surface, the designer host calls the method. 方法显示一个用户界面, 用于生成连接字符串表达式并返回用户选择的连接字符串。The method displays a user interface for building the connection string expression and returns the connection string that is selected by the user. 方法指示用户界面的显示样式。The method indicates the display style of the user interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类的实例与自定义控件内包含的属性相关联。The following code example demonstrates how to associate an instance of the class with a property that is contained within a custom control. 在设计图面中编辑控件属性时, 类提供用户界面, 以便为属性值选择和编辑连接字符串。When the control property is edited in the design surface, the class provides the user interface to select and edit a connection string for the property value. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.design.connectionstringeditor/CS/ConnectionStringEditorSample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.design.connectionstringeditor/VB/ConnectionStringEditorSample.vb#2)]

span.span: Working with Connection Strings

Public Overrides Function EditValue (context As ITypeDescriptorContext, provider As IServiceProvider, value As Object) As Object

override this.EditValue : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext * IServiceProvider * obj -> obj

param.name: context
param.span: 用于获取其他上下文信息的 。

span.span: An to use to gain additional context information.

param.name: provider
param.span: 用来获得编辑服务的服务提供程序对象。

span.span: A service provider object through which to obtain editing services.
An instance of the object being edited.

summary.span: 使用指定的服务提供程序和上下文编辑指定对象的值。

span.span: Edits the value of the specified object by using the specified service provider and context.

returns.span: 所选的连接表达式（作为字符串对象）；否则，如果未选择连接表达式，则为传入的 。

span.span: The selected connection expression, as a string object; otherwise, if a connection expression was not selected, the same that was passed in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法启动用于`value`编辑对象的用户界面。 The method starts the user interface for editing the `value` object. 当您编辑连接字符串编辑器所关联的属性的值时, 设计器宿主将调用方法。The designer host calls the method when you edit the value of a property that the connection string editor is associated with. 输入服务提供程序用于获取方法中所需的任何编辑服务。The input service provider is used to obtain any editing services that are required within the method. 如果在指定的上下文中支持 服务实现,则该方法将初始化一个控件,该控件将提示您选择现有连接表达式或生成新的连接表达式。If an service implementation is supported in the specified context, the method initializes a control, which prompts you to select an existing connection expression or build a new connection expression. 如果在指定的上下文中不支持 服务实现, 则方法会显示类的简单实例, 这将提示您输入连接表达式字符串。If an service implementation is not supported in the specified context, the method displays a simple instance of the class, which prompts you to enter the connection expression string. 如果在不选择连接表达式字符串的情况下取消, 则返回的对象与`value`参数相同。If you cancel without selecting a connection expression string, the returned object is the same as the `value` parameter.

span.span: Working with Connection Strings

param.name: context
param.span: 用于获取其他上下文信息的 。

span.span: An to use to gain additional context information.

summary.span: 返回与指定上下文的连接字符串编辑器关联的编辑样式。

span.span: Returns the editing style that is associated with the connection string editor for the specified context.

returns.span: 一个 枚举值，该值指示所提供的用户界面的编辑样式。

span.span: An enumeration value that indicates the editing style for the provided user interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下, 类的方法返回值。By default, the method of the class returns the value. 如果在指定的上下文中支持 服务实现,则该方法将返回值。If an service implementation is supported in the specified context, the method returns the value. 如果在指定的上下文中不支持该方法, 则该方法将返回值。If the method is not supported in the specified context, the method returns the value.

summary.span: 返回提供的 类实例的提供程序名称。

span.span: Returns the provider name for the provided instance of the class.
Always an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法获取类的当前实例的提供程序名称。 The method gets the provider name for the current instance of the class. 例如, 在从 类派生的类中, 方法返回提供程序名称。For example, in the class, which is derived from class, the method returns the provider name.

span.span: A or an instance of a derived class.
A .

summary.span: 将提供程序名称放在 类的指定实例上。

span.span: Puts the provider name on the specified instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在`instance`参数上设置提供程序名称。 The method sets the provider name on the `instance` parameter. 例如, 在派生`SqlDataSourceConnectionStringEditor` 自类的中, 如果连接是配置的连接, 则这将设置提供程序名称或添加对象。For example, in the `SqlDataSourceConnectionStringEditor`, which derives from the class, this either sets the provider name or adds an object, if the connection is a configured connection. 在此实现中, 方法不执行任何操作。In this implementation, the method does nothing.

span.span: Working with Connection Strings
